create_new_dropbox_folder.name: create_new_dropbox_folder
create_new_dropbox_folder.description: Create a new empty folder in your Dropbox

path.description: The path of the new folder e.g. /Homework/math

autorename.description: If there's a conflict, have the Dropbox server try to autorename the folder to avoid the conflict. The default for this field is False.

create_new_dropbox_text_file.name: create_new_dropbox_text_file
create_new_dropbox_text_file.description: Create a new text file in your Dropbox from text input

path.description: The path of the new folder e.g. /Homework/math

text.description: The text to write into the file.

autorename.description: If there's a conflict, have the Dropbox server try to autorename the folder to avoid the conflict. The default for this field is False.

mute.description: Normally, users are made aware of any file modifications in their Dropbox account via notifications in the client software. If true, this tells the clients that this modification shouldn't result in a user notification.

strict_conflict.description: Be more strict about how each WriteMode detects conflict. For example, always return a conflict error when mode = WriteMode.update and the given "rev" doesn't match the existing file's "rev", even if the existing file has been deleted.
